reviews.text: So welcome so happy and delicious food

Great food and I love their poutine and their shawarma bowl. They also give you a lot so I often end up with leftovers that taste just as good the next day. It‚Äôs also pretty affordable, typically costing around$10-15.
Love this place!! Amazing food, I eat here several times a week
Very tasty
Food and customer service was amazing

Ordered food from here for a work party at our nearby hospital. Amazing customer service. The staff was very respectful. We were even given complimentary fries for the waiting time. Would definitely order from here again!
It was good
Food is so good, my favorite is the tikka saj wrap. Staff is also super nice.
Very nice clean and professionnel food taste fresh and tasty .
I tried the falafel bowl and it was delicious. Staff were friendly and clarified menu to myself and other customers. However, my order was partially incorrect with 2 items missing from the bowl.
Food was great portion and food was prepared fast
It‚Äôs awesome
It‚Äôs a very good eating place to eat
It was wonderful the shawarma and the cheese burger fries was great
‚ÄèWorst service I have ever experienced. Very bad. You order one thing and get another. And the cashier went and handed me the food. The cook is so sad.
Very nice place

When you walk into the cozy atmosphere, you are greeted warmly by friendly staff. The menu offers delicious, high-quality dishes made from fresh, locally sourced ingredients, and the portions are generous enough to leave you feeling satisfied.
This Place Is Amazing
Good portion and good value
I love chicken shawarma saj wrap is super flavorful

I came here for the 1st time the staff is really friendly they have great suggestions and the food is good and u get a good amount of food for a great price best shawarma place ever and I ain‚Äôt even from the area
Definitely will go back.
The best shawarma I‚Äôve had in NYC. Food is HMS halal certified for those curious. I wish beef shawarma was an option but the chicken is very good.I would highly recommend this place.
Brother Safwan was very nice and very accommodating.
Great service and great food!
Owner was very polite and helpful with meal
Fires were really good best i ever had
Very good  üëç

Excellent food and friendly staff
Thank you for serving authentic food in Bronx neighborhood

New halal spot in the Bronx, this is a chain from Canada. We tried the chicken poutine, chicken tikka bowl, chicken shawarma & smash burger.  Everything was pretty good.  The poutine was interesting, fries were nice & crispy.  The shawarma wasn't bad but I have definitely had better.  The chicken tikka bowl was good & flavorful. Smash burger was good too. Service was great.
This place was amazing! I went during the national shawarma day and the people were so nice. Not to mention the food was just so good I wish i had gotten more. 10/10 i WILL come back.
Bad customer service
Absolutely amazing!! I had no idea what to expect but I was blown away by the service and the food! Couldn‚Äôt have had a better experience!
I love the is place it‚Äôs amazing!! The food is fantastic!
Delicious food and great service
Delicious
Amazing food and very affordable
This is firee
Great food with great portions.
Give me special treatment
Warm, clean, and delicious. Chicken shawarma saj wrap is my go-to. Much love!
Great food!! Friendly staff
Best shawarma in the city hands down!!
Good place

Very good food and good very good service
I really recommend this spot

Ordered through Uber eats at 2 o‚Äôclock in the morning  and it‚Äôs the Best shawarma I‚Äôve had in the Bronx. Chicken shawarma wrap and  chicken shawarma poutine has amazing flavors that are worth the price , can‚Äôt believe other are charging just as much compared to this. Thank you for this wonderful meal
Good food
Love their salad bowls.
I love their chicken and fries!! So good!
Great spot amazing food

If you‚Äôre anywhere near Jerome Ave and haven‚Äôt tried Ace Shawarma, you‚Äôre truly missing out. From the moment we walked in, the service was warm, attentive, and on point. The staff went above and beyond to make sure everything was just right ‚Äî even surprising my kids with free fries, which absolutely made their day!

Now, the food‚Ä¶ wow. Every bite was packed with flavor. We ordered the Chicken Shawarma Ace Bowl, Bacon Cheeseburger, Chicken Shawarma Saj Wrap, and a refreshing lemonade. Each dish was prepared perfectly ‚Äî the shawarma was juicy and well-seasoned, the burger was indulgent and satisfying, and the wrap was loaded with flavor in every bite. We also asked for extra sauces, and they didn‚Äôt hold back ‚Äî which took everything to the next level.

The portions were generous, the presentation was inviting, and most importantly, everything tasted fresh and delicious. This is the kind of place that leaves you planning your next visit before you‚Äôve even finished your meal.

Ace Shawarma isn‚Äôt just another food spot ‚Äî it‚Äôs a gem on Jerome Ave. Highly recommend it to anyone looking for quality food, excellent service, and a genuinely enjoyable dining experience. On top of all this they are HMS CERTIFIED which means they are 100% ACTUAL HALAL FOOD!

This place was on my list for trying out for some time now. Heard so much about it, I had to try it out. And as expected they didn't disappoint! We had ordered their original poutine,  chicken shwarma ace bowl, a saj roll and a shwarma cheese burger. Everything was delicious! We also got some drinks from their Tractor selection. I must say they are really good at their menu.  Would definitely recommend!

The place is nice and clean. Staff is very friendly. The food was delicious and filling. We had the chicken shawarmas, poutine chicken shawarma, the chicken and beef shawarma burger, beef shawarma burger, and chicken shawarma bites. This is place to save to your favorites.

Decided to stop by and try out the grand opening. Was surprised by the aesthetics, layout, and cleanliness. very well done. The chicken shawarma was worth the trip and the best I‚Äôve had in a long time. Would highly recommend.
Just tried this new spot and loved it! The chicken shawarma bowl was healthy, flavorful, and super satisfying. Great portion size, clean space, and friendly service. Definitely coming back!

It‚Äôs was amazing the moment you walk in, everyone on the staff has amazing energy. and the food is even better from the presentation down to how it taste even how it served in front of you. I highly recommend this place to anyone how need a good meal and smile to go.

Visited today to go support the new business! The service was quick and very welcoming. The food was great, very flavorful, and came out quick but not sloppy at all. I had the cheeseburger and it was just so good! The flavors were all there, must get the caramelized onions yall!

Finally visited this place after a long waiting time my expectations were high but unfortunately they were not good enough to make it up to that burger was a bit salty and the chicken in shawarma was bit sour in the bowl they didn‚Äôt add the garlic sauce how it should be but there service was good and presentation too.
Hope they will work on it and improve the taste.
Omg the poutine and ace bowl was so goodddd. Have to try the shawarma wrap next ! Amazing portions !
The food would blow your mind and  is soo cheap and delicious i have to come back again.

We had a great overall dining experience here. The food was tasty, the prices were reasonable, and the customer service was outstanding.

We tried the double smash burger, the falafel saj, and the pita chips with falafel, and we also had some of the "tractor" to drink, which was very refreshing. The portions were very generous, although I wish they would have gotten it right in preparing the burger without cheese which I specifically asked for.

Be advised that it's not located the "nicest" neighborhood, but that's probably not an issue for you if you are grabbing something to eat in the Bronx.

I had an amazing experience at Ace Shawarma and Burgers! From the moment I walked in, the hospitality was top-notch, the staff were so welcoming and genuinely cared about making sure everything was perfect.

I ordered the smash burger and poutine, and both were absolutely delicious. The burger was juicy, flavorful, and cooked to perfection, and the poutine was rich, cheesy, and incredibly satisfying. You can really taste the quality in every bite.

Highly recommend this spot if you‚Äôre craving comfort food done right with a side of great service!
VERY GREAT PLACE FOR SOME FOOD MUST TRY!!! WILL BE COMING BACK THANK YOU SO MUCH .

The staff are very cordial and professional. The restaurant was spotless whilst the decor was inviting yet not overstimulating. I think the minimal labeling is a smart move and actually gives an authentic feel to the restaurant. The food was extremely delicious and the portions are quite large for the price, which are both great! I ordered a large chicken shawarma poutine for $13 and it shattered my expectations for this restaurant. A solid 8.5/10 will buy again and will try out the rest of the menu! It was so appetizing I literally got the itus and dozed off in the afternoon. That‚Äôs rare for me!!! I‚Äôm so glad they opened something new nearby that‚Äôs so good!!! Thank you!!!

Best shawarma wrap on Jerome !..or may  be in the Bronx..the wrap is super freshly baked‚Ä¶.lot of chicken‚Ä¶believe me and the yummy garlic mayo makes me crazy..love this place ‚Ä¶my lunch hour favorite‚ù§Ô∏è

What an amazing new spot with great tasting food. I found this place on google maps and it was about a 30 minute drive from me in CT.

Totally worth the drive. Not only are they open late but the owner and all the employees (shoutout Saad!) are such kind folks. And the food taste, quality and quantity exceeded my expectations.

I got the chicken shawarma, bacon cheese burger and cheeseburger poutine. All were delicious and the toppings in the shawarma tasted so fresh.

When they found out I drove from CT they not only gave me 2 coupons for my next visit but also let me try the tractor dragonfruit drink. It was really good! Not too sweet and very refreshing. Such a cool place and even cooler owners.

Oh and the restaurant is brand new. Beautiful interior design that looks super modern and very clean.

Keep up the great work guys and I can‚Äôt wait to come back! Thank you for all your hospitality and fantastic customer experience.

5/5 experience.
Amazing fresh food, amazing people working there. Let us customize the food as we wanted.
Shawarma burger...awesome.

I ordered the chicken shawarma wrap and it was phenomenal. The chicken was perfectly seasoned‚Äîjuicy, flavorful, and had just the right amount of char from the grill. The wrap itself was warm and soft, holding everything together without falling apart. What really brought it all together was the sauce‚Äîcreamy, tangy, and addictive‚Äîand the crisp veggies added a perfect crunch. Every bite was balanced and bursting with flavor. Hands down one of the best shawarma wraps I‚Äôve ever had. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back for more!

The food is absolutely fire. Everything was fresh, flavorful, and well-seasoned. On top of that, the place was clean, the service was quick, and the staff were super friendly. Definitely a go-to halal spot in the area. I‚Äôll be coming back for sure. Highly recommend!

Amazing place, first time going there and I literally loved it, the food is freshly made, the customer service is fantastic, my order was taking a bit to get done but that wasn‚Äôt a problem because they spoke to me very kindly and even offer if I wanted anything to drink while I waited, and the the amount of food the give for cheap prices is amazing, I totally recommend this place if you‚Äôre looking for delicious flavors and cheap places to eat with friends or even work lunch hours, will totally be going again!!
Awesome food! Definitely recommended!

First time here everything was delicious
Recommended for a quick lunch.
My first time here and I love it already everything clean , customer service amazing , food amazing I‚Äôll definitely be coming back
Delicious, great service, clean beautiful ambiance, big portions and great prices! What more can you ask for. And they have a zabiha halal certification on display. Perfect foodie spot
SO good! Portions are great and so is the taste. From the poutine to the wraps, you can‚Äôt go wrong with whatever you order here.
The food here is really good, I would highly recommend getting this spot. Customer service is perfect. I would recommend getting the chicken shawarma signature.
Love Ace Shawarma.. Amazing food all around!!! The Shawarma Bowl is my favorite.. Arlene was amazing at customer service .. Please try their food

Wow, we ordered this online and had such a wonderful surprise!! Beautifully crafted, balanced food here with use of high quality, fresh ingredients. We had a burger, wrap, and fries. And each one was delicious. Now we have a new regular spot.

I got hook on this place ü§£. One day I was going in my building and I see a young guy with scooter putting flyers on doors. He give me a menu with discount and tell me ‚Äúif you come to restaurant, I make you the best shawarma burger of your life, just ask for Achraf.‚Äù He even make me write his name on paper ü§£. I was really impressed with his marketing.

3 days later I go with my kids, but Achraf was not working. Next day I come back, I see him and of course I ask him to make my shawarma burger ü§£. And for real‚Ä¶ it was the best, also my first time eating one. Now every time I go I always ask for Achraf ü§£ü§£.

Yesterday I try the tikka poutine ‚Äî it was so delicious üòã.

Just tried this place for lunch ‚Äî the food was very good and delicious! The customer service was especially humble and welcoming. They serve authentic shawarma with a unique flavor that's different from other places. The restaurant is clean, and all the meat is Zabiha Halal. Definitely worth a try if you're looking for something tasty and different!
seriously impressed. The food was on point  super tasty, great portions, and everything felt fresh. The vibe was relaxed, and the service was fast and friendly
Food was great and the place looks amazing! The customer service made the experience even better!  Can‚Äôt wait to be back soon!!
Place is amazing! Good service, good quality food and they served me under 15 mins! Brings me back home from rialpudi
Some napkins on table but otherwise food taste excellent and good quality food.
Great food. Chicken is awesome with the schwarma bowls. Recommended

Very welcoming environment with great food to match surprisingly i went two days in a row and the second day I was greeted by name. Staff was very polite and aim to please. Food was fresh and seasoned great flavor was very robust can't wait to go back to try other things
Amazing food and amazing staff. Best place to have your shawarma and poutine

Best Shawarma in the in the city, it‚Äôs 100% Zabiha halal HMS certified. Omg the chicken tikka saj wrap is made to perfection. Also must try the juicy cheeseburger made with organic Grass fed beef with added bacon and spicy fries truly hit the spot. Chicken ace bowl is a delight with bursting flavors & tender chicken.  And oh the poutines options add a whole other dimension that‚Äôs not found anywhere else in the city. Above all, amazing service and friendly staff that customizes and accommodates meals to fit your preferences!
ü©∑ü©∑ü©∑
Great food great service, very good authentic shawarma‚Äôs and great cheeseburgers.

Food is amazing and fair priced as well. This is my third time eating since they opened and I will continue going daily to eat from there. The staff is super friendly they make you feel like your family. Definitely will be a regular here.
New place with Zabiha Halal Shawarma & Poutine!!! Really courteous and welcoming staff... and the food options are so awesome!
Really good food already my third time here!!
The food is so flavor full and delicious I will come here when. Ever I can the service when great the workers always smile

We ordered their signature wrap and ace bowls and they were so good. Taste portion and quality everything was on point. I wish they had restrooms, we came from ct and have little kids and it was so hard with them. Parking is bit difficult to find as it has street parking.
